name: Kick Mr. Burns in both Homer 1 and 2
Bonfire of the Manatees in First Person
Bonus game race with at least 3 laps
In Lisa, complete a mission in the Honor Roller
Destroy the limo The Old Pirate and the Sea past the Bowlerama

Put any NPC in the well
Complete 3 missions in reverse order consecutively
